Officer Tolonis: I am Officer Tolonis, and I'm in charge of delivering supplies like Energy Stones to adventurers. I used to be a platoon leader, but after I was injured they gave me this posting. I'm proud of what I do here, but I miss the life of battle. Oh well, I suppose somebody has to manage supplies. If you're interested in acquiring the collection skill, perhaps I can help.
